attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned wish for HM Government to stand with the people of Ukraine against the unwarranted aggression by the Russian Federation and wish for the following:

1) Discussions to remove Russia from the G8 and revert back to G7.
2) Refuse any further discussions in relation to Visa facilitation
3) Impose economic sanctions on Russian trade if supported by fellow EU members
4) Support Georgia, Ukraine, Armenia in their aspiration to become members of Nato and EU
